name: geb-uniswap-subgraph
description: The Graph protocol subgraph for GEB tokens on Uniswap

scripts.deploy-local: npm run codegen && npm run create; graph deploy --node ${GRAPH_ADMIN_RPC_URL} --ipfs ${IPFS_URL} ${SUBGRAPH_NAME}
scripts.deploy-hosted-kovan: npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-uniswap-kovan
scripts.deploy-hosted-mainnet: npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-uniswap-mainnet
scripts.deploy-hosted-dev: npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guifel/rai-uniswap

author: Guillaume Felley
